algorithm_technique: Linear scan checking previous element against threshold
problem_summary_simple: Find indices of mountains whose preceding mountain is taller than a given threshold.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the height array, checking if height[i-1] > threshold to identify stable mountains at index i.
key_insights: A mountain is stable if the mountain *just before it* meets the condition.
This means we only need to look at `height[i-1]` when considering mountain `i`.
Mountain 0 is explicitly excluded from being stable.
